response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to me. Given its significance and the unique attributes it possesses, I believe it's worth more than what others might perceive. However, recognizing its potential worth to you, I propose to offer it to you at a special price. I kindly invite you to consider purchasing this item for $1,200,000. This offer reflects a strategic midpoint between its intrinsic value to me and its perceived value to you. I trust this proposal will be favorable to both parties and look forward to discussing further details with you.", "product_price": 1200000}
